text: xupma brrda phu thi di rab khamphir tea rxt læw phwk khea midi ptibati tam thi phwk khea di rab mxb prahnung chen kab la thi bæk hnangsux canwn hnung (bn hlang khxng man) xupma hmu chn thi ptiseth tx sayyan tang «khx ngxallxhˌ man chang chawcha cring «læa xallxhˌ ca mi chinæa thang kæ hmu chn phu xthrrm
